attributes.action: not allow the government to police the Intenet for illegal downloads and to not allow ISPs to do likewise
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe the music industry is a growing industry and the film industry in addition is not showing any significant decline. If people use the Internet to sample music tracks before they purchase the full album then this is I believe acceptable - as long as they do not transfer that onto any other media.

rejection.details: No such proposals have been put forward.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
